meanings.definition: Remove an obstruction from (a pipe or drain)
meanings.sent1: I need to unclog the sink so the water can flow smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The plumber used a special tool to unclog the blocked pipe.
meanings.sent3: Unclogging the drain turned out to be easier than I thought.
meanings.sent4: Her words helped unclog the thoughts stuck in my mind.
meanings.sent5: After hours of work, he finally managed to unclog the stubborn pipe.

meanings.definition: Clear a blockage from (a pipe or drain)
meanings.sent1: We should unclog the gutter before it causes any damage.
meanings.sent2: Using a plunger can help unclog the toilet quickly.
meanings.sent3: Unclogging the drain felt like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to unclog the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The key to unclog the issue was effective communication.
